responses: I'm sorry, I didn't catch that.
Hello! I am ARIA, your virtual assistant. How can I assist you today?
Hi there! I'm ARIA, the school's AI assistant. How may I help you?
Good day! This is ARIA. How can I be of service?
Goodbye! Have a great day ahead.
See you later! Let ARIA know if you need anything else.
Take care! ARIA is always here to help.
You're welcome! ARIA is happy to help.
Anytime! Let me know if you need anything else.
Glad to assist you!

patterns: How do I register for classes?
How can I enroll in subjects?
How to sign up for subjects?
Where do I go to enroll?
Can you guide me with registration?
Steps to register in the portal?
What do I need for class registration?
responses: You need your previous academic card and proof of tuition payment. The system will save your data and generate a unique ID.

patterns: Why can’t I enroll in a course?
Why am I blocked from enrolling in a course?
What could stop me from enrolling?
Why is the portal blocking my enrollment?
Why won’t the system let me enroll?
responses: You may be an irregular student or a transferee. Transferees require evaluation, and irregular students must retake any missed prerequisites.

patterns: How do I drop or withdraw from a class?
How can I withdraw from a class?
Where do I request class withdrawal?
Can I still drop a subject?
What’s the process to cancel a subject?
How do I officially drop a subject?
responses: Visit the registrar and request a withdrawal form to drop the class.

patterns: How do I request my transcript?
How can I get my transcript of records?
How do I get my TOR?
Can I get my records online?
How do I claim my transcript?
What’s the process for transcript request?
responses: Visit the registrar or scan the QR code on STI College Calamba’s Facebook page to request your transcript.

patterns: How can I view my grades?
Where can I check my grades?
How do I see my scores?
Where do I log in to see grades?
Can I see my grades online?
My grades are missing, where do I check?
How do I check my results?
responses: You can view them on ELMS or One STI. If you can't, you may have a pending balance. You can also request a copy at the registrar.

patterns: Why is there a hold on my account?
Why can’t I register—account on hold?
Reason for hold on my profile?
Why can’t I access my account?
responses: You may have unpaid tuition or a case from the Guidance Office.

patterns: How do I apply for scholarships or financial aid?
How can I apply for a scholarship?
Where do I get scholarship forms?
How do I get financial aid?
Can I apply for a grant?
responses: To apply for a scholarship, visit the registrar to request the necessary forms.

patterns: I can’t log into the student portal.
Why can’t I access the portal?
I forgot my login details for the portal.
I’m locked out of the student portal.
How do I fix my portal account?
Portal won’t let me log in.
responses: Please visit the MIS office to fix your account.

patterns: How do I reset my password?
How do I recover my account password?
How do I change my password?
What to do if I forgot my password?
responses: Make sure your email is connected to your STI account to receive a verification number for password reset.

patterns: Where can I access my student email?
How do I log into my STI email?
I can’t open my student email.
How to get my school email?
responses: Visit the MIS office for assistance with student email.

patterns: How do I join a club or student organization?
Where can I sign up for clubs?
How can I be part of a student org?
How do I register for a club?
responses: You can be referred or nominate yourself during elections or reevaluation for student organizations.

patterns: How can I pay for my tuition?
Can I pay online for tuition?
How do I settle my tuition?
responses: Discuss with the admissions office and pay at the cashier. Bring your RAF for your student ID.

patterns: How can I get to complete my clearance form?
responses: Ensure you meet all requirements and have no pending balances to complete your clearance form.

patterns: What mode of payment is available on the campus?
How can I pay my fees?
responses: We accept payments via GCash, M-Lhuillier, and cash.

patterns: What are the steps to purchase a uniform or STI shirts?
Where do I buy my uniform?
How do I get an STI shirt?
Where can I purchase school uniform?
responses: Head to PAMO or Proware, get measured, receive a tentative receipt, and proceed to the cashier for the official receipt.

patterns: Where can I find the PAMO?
How do I get to Proware?
responses: PAMO or Proware is on the ground floor, right side of the campus.

patterns: Where can I find the Building Administration Office?
How do I get to the building office?
responses: Located on the ground floor, left side of the campus.

patterns: Where can I find the Faculty Office?
How do I get to the faculty office?
responses: The Faculty Office is on the mezzanine.

patterns: Where can I find the School Clinic?
How do I reach the clinic?
responses: The School Clinic is on the ground floor, left side of the campus.

patterns: Where can I find the Comfort Room?
responses: Ground floor: left side. 2nd/3rd floors: left side for males, right side for females.

patterns: Where can I find the Students Affair Office?
Where is the student affairs office?
responses: Located on the ground floor, left side of the campus.

patterns: Where can I find the Mezzanine?
How do I go to the mezzanine?
responses: Take the stairs on the left or press M in the elevator to reach the mezzanine.

patterns: Where can I find the School Administrator’s Office?
How do I get to the administrator’s office?
responses: The School Administrator’s Office is on the mezzanine.

patterns: Where can I find the MIS?
How do I go to MIS?
responses: The MIS Office is on the 3rd floor, right side of the campus.

patterns: Where can I find the Conference Hall?
How do I go to the conference room?
responses: The Conference Hall is on the mezzanine floor, right side of the campus.

patterns: Where can I find the Function Hall?
How do I go to the function hall?
responses: Located on the 4th floor, right side of the campus.

patterns: Where can I find the library?
How do I go to the library?
responses: The Library is on the 4th floor, right side. Use the elevator and press 4.

patterns: Where can I find the Canteen?
responses: The canteen is located on the roofdeck of the campus.

patterns: Where can I find the Registrar?
How do I go to registrar?
responses: The registrar is on the ground floor beside the cashier.

patterns: Where can I find the Cashier?
How do I go to cashier?
responses: The cashier is located on the ground floor beside the registrar.

patterns: Why do I need a uniform pass?
How to get a uniform pass?
Where to get a uniform pass?
responses: You can get a uniform pass from Student Affairs if you have a valid reason for not wearing the uniform.
